nodes.bodyText:
So there seem to be only one case when this can be invoked - from within SecurityServices#getSecurityContextAssociator() when elytronDomation is null. Can this even be a case? E.g. can you at any time have neither elytron nor picketbox on CP?
If so, then this is ok, I am just asking since my knowledge of security has the quality of a swiss chesse - it has lots of holes :)

It gets hard to achieve due to default security domain attributes on some subsystems but yes it should be possible that a deployment is deployed with no security activated so there could be a case legacy security is not available and no Elytron domain is associated either.
